Question: In February 1955, this person dispatched the first American soldiers to Vietnam as military advisors to Diem's army.
Hints: This person attended Abilene High School and graduated with the class of 1909.
This person maintained no political party affiliation during this time, though he was clear in not aligning with the Democrats.
This person requested consideration for either Annapolis or West Point with his U.S Senator, Joseph L Bristow.
